name: Cliché is Classic
storyline: "Gay romance? I don't write stuff like that." You're an arrogant writer who looks down on others after your big break. But by accident, you end up in a hetero romance novel, and even kiss the male lead. The story starts shifting towards gay romance, and you're the star surrounded by attractive men! Can you safely make your way out of the mess?
summary: Cliché Is Classic is an original maybe series romance visual novel. "You're not supposed to like me!" Jean River is a shameless writer whose built his career around stealing other people's stories. After a night of drinking, he finds himself in the world of a hetero romance novel written by a nameless writer. He accidentally kisses the male protagonist, and the story starts shifting to gay romance… Can he safely escape the chaotic narrative?
